Intro to Maps

![Pak Map](/pak_map.png){width=80%}

```{r}

library(leaflet)
library(magrittr)

m = leaflet() %>% addTiles() 
m %>% fitBounds(0,40,10,50) %>%
  setView(-93.65, 42.0285, zoom = 17) %>% 
  addPopups(-93.65, 42.0285, "Here is the <b>Department of Statistics</b>, ISU")
  
```
